your-account-is-not-linked: your account is not linked, use `$command`
all-your-links-were-deleted: tous vos liens ont été supprimés
this-account-was-linked-with: $sender, ce compte a été associé à $discordTag.
help-message: $sender, to link your account on Discord: 1. Go to Discord server and send $command in bot channel. | 2. Wait for PM from bot | 3. Send command from your Discord PM here in twitch chat.
link-whisper:
Hello $tag, to link this Discord account with your Twitch account on $broadcaster channel, go to <https://twitch.tv/$broadcaster>, login to your account and send this command to chat 

		`$command $id`

NOTE: This expires in 10 minutes.
check-your-dm: vérifiez vos DMs pour les étapes à suivre afin de lier votre compte.
